item.text: For it is not necessary for me to write you about this service to the saints

<st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4288" class="">eagerness to help</st>.<n id="1" /> I keep <st data-num="2744" class="">boasting</st> to the <st data-num="3110" class="">Macedonians</st> <st data-num="5228">about</st> this eagerness of <st data-num="4771" class="">yours</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="882" class="">Achaia</st> has been <st data-num="3903" class="">ready</st> to give<n id="3" /> <st data-num="575">since</st> <st data-num="4070">last year</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2205" class="">zeal</st> to participate<n id="4" /> has <st data-num="2042">stirred up</st> <st data-num="4183">most</st> of them.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I am <st data-num="3992" class="">sending</st><n id="1" /> these <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2745" class="">boasting</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">about</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> may not be <st data-num="2758" class="">empty</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3313" class="">case</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> you may <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3903" class="">ready</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> I kept <st data-num="3004" class="">telling</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="3361 4458">For</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> any of the <st data-num="3110" class="">Macedonians</st> should <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> that <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="532" class="">not ready</st> to give, <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> would be <st data-num="2617" class="">humiliated</st><n id="1" /> (<st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="3004" class="">mention</st> you) <st data-num="1722">by</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5287" class="">confidence</st> we had in <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> I <st data-num="2233" class="">thought</st> it <st data-num="316" class="">necessary</st> to <st data-num="3870" class="">urge</st> these <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4281" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4281">in advance</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="4294" class="">arrange ahead of time</st> the <st data-num="2129" class="">generous contribution</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> had <st data-num="4279" class="">promised</st>, so <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> may <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2092" class="">ready</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="2129" class="">generous gift</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="4124" class="">something you feel forced to do</st>.<n id="3" />

My point is <st data-num="3778" class="">this:</st> The person who <st data-num="4687" class="">sows</st> <st data-num="5340" class="">sparingly</st> will <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2325" class="">reap</st> <st data-num="5340" class="">sparingly</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the person who <st data-num="4687" class="">sows</st> <st data-num="2129" class="">generously</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2325" class="">reap</st> <st data-num="2129" class="">generously</st>.

<st data-num="1538">Each one</st> of you should give<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> he has <st data-num="4255" class="">decided</st> in his <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3077" class="">reluctantly</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">under</st> <st data-num="318" class="">compulsion</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="25" class="">loves</st> a <st data-num="2431" class="">cheerful</st> <st data-num="1395" class="">giver</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> is <st data-num="1414" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="4052" class="">make</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> <st data-num="4052" class="">overflow</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> because you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="841" class="">enough</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="1722">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every way</st> <st data-num="3842" class="">at all times</st>, you will <st data-num="4052" class="">overflow</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st>.
Just as it is written, “He has scattered widely, he has given to the poor; his righteousness remains forever.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> God<n id="1" /> who <st data-num="2023" class="">provides</st> <st data-num="4703" class="">seed</st> for the <st data-num="4687" class="">sower</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1035" class="">food</st> will <st data-num="5524" class="">provide</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4129" class="">multiply</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> supply of <st data-num="4703" class="">seed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will cause the <st data-num="1081" class="">harvest</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st> to <st data-num="837" class="">grow</st>.

You will be <st data-num="4148" class="">enriched</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every way</st> so that you may be <st data-num="572" class="">generous</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> occasion,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3748" class="">which</st> is <st data-num="2716" class="">producing</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="2169" class="">thanksgiving</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,

<st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="1248" class="">service</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3009" class="">ministry</st> <st data-num="1510">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3440" class="">only</st> <st data-num="4322" class="">providing</st> for<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5303" class="">needs</st> of the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> is <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="4052" class="">overflowing</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="2169" class="">thanks</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1223" class="">Through</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1382" class="">evidence</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1248" class="">service</st><n id="2" /> they will <st data-num="1392" class="">glorify</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">because of</st> your <st data-num="5292" class="">obedience</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3671" class="">confession</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="572" class="">generosity</st> of your <st data-num="2842" class="">sharing</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> in <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1162" class="">prayers</st> on <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">behalf</st>, they <st data-num="1971">long for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> the <st data-num="5235" class="">extraordinary</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has shown <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="1" />
Thanks be to God for his indescribable gift!
